00001 #include <QFile>

00003 #include <mathml/mmldocument.h>
00004 #include "../qmathml/mmlreader.h"
00005 #include "valgrind.h"
00006 #include "dummypainter.h"

00008 void
00009 parse(MMLReader *r, const char *filepath) {
00010         QFile f(filepath);
00011         f.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly);
00012         r->parse(f);
00013         f.close();
00014         MMLDocument *doc = r->document();
00015         DummyPainter p;
00016         doc->setPainter(&p);
00017         doc->validate();
00018         doc->layout();
00019         doc->paint();
00020         delete doc;
00021 }
00022 
00023 int
00024 main(int argc, const char **argv) {
00025         MMLReader r;
00026         for (int i=1; i<argc; ++i) {
00027                 parse(&r, argv[i]);
00028         }
00029         return VALGRIND_COUNT_ERRORS;
00030 }
